thread.title: Watch: Trail Blazers 'in a good spot' midway through preseason
thread.title_full: Watch: Trail Blazers 'in a good spot' midway through preseason | OregonLive.com

author: Sean Meagher | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: Trail Blazers 'in a good spot' midway through preseason
text:
The new-look Trail Blazers are 2-2 at the midway-point preseason , showing encouraging signs in the court through four games.
With 11 new faces on Portland's training camp roster, the first two weeks of October have been spent figuring out how all the new pieces fit together on both ends of the floor.
"I think we're in a good spot right now," fourth-year forward Meyers Leonard said Tuesday. "I think we have chemistry we're building on the court (and) off the court. ... I think we're really buying into the process; get better every day, see what we can do individually and collectively to help the team moving into the season."
In the video above, Blazers coach Terry Stotts and Leonard discuss the progress from the Blazers through four preseason games.
